body: These clear crystals fit over the wearer's eyes. They grant the wearer a +2 competence bonus on Perception checks, and the wearer gains low-light vision. If the wearer has low-light vision already, these lenses double the distance the wearer can see with this vision.
name: Eyes of Keen Sight
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Eyes/Eyes Slot Wondrous Items/Eyes of Keen Sight
